Transcription for 547091

click link for download
Holy Spirit, Holy Spirit, Breathe on me the breath of love.
To work out in my exorment, To be thine my sun-gripped soul,
Let me know this very moment, That my heart is clean and full.
Holy Spirit, Holy Spirit, Kill me with thy mighty heart.
And for J slept and the other swked, And my love, and I love,
And hear my prayers, and speak the proud, Live with love in Thou perchance.
Borus vis ai, Borus vis ai Erinうん sustaining Joint
evannin allá nécessam, laet Aquahi.
